text: yeung ban banhchouh vea hi aoy mou sa ning bangobrosa robsa ke( ha rou n) tha anak teangpir trauv tang lomnow dthan now bratesa ehsaib aoy krom robsa anak teangpir haey chaur puok anak thveu aoy lomnow dthan robsa puok anak chea kanleng samreab tamrong tisa( korp sakkar) . haey chaur puok anak brate b tde sa lat ning phdal damnoeng rikreay dl banda anak del mean chomnue choh
